description: Animals, Animals is about some of the fascinating animals in our world. Each page describes interesting facts and brings the world of animals to the reader. Pictures enhance the text.
meta: camel, elephants, elk, fox, giraffes, hippopotamus, kangaroo, polar bears, snow leopards, zebra
